response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the impact it can have on your operations, I'm offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,500. This special offer is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment to excellence in your field. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14500}
